page.title: 06Farming
page.content: We have eight{farms}in our area,Mr Lambut owns{Low Paull Farm}and{South {Pasture Farm.}Mr Annison owns{Boreas {Hill Farm}and{Lakes Farm.}Mr Shore owns{Boreas Vale Farm.}Charley Hill owns or rents{Auster Grange}and{Paull {Holm Farm.}Mr Cayley owns{Little {Humber Farm. Mr Annisons{employs}a son and one worker and he pays him eighty seven pound a week.Mr Cayley has 9 full time workers and about 5 part-time and he pays them 135 pound depending on the kind of job. Mr Annison breeds pheasants,(that's all his animals).Mr Cayley owns 778 pigs,one cow,872 sheep and 169 cattle for fattening on grass.Mr Annison has 390 acres ,196 wheat,103 of barley 82 of rape.Mr Cayley has 228 wheat,115 barley 103 of rape 80 of potatoes 72 fruit and 75 grass.
